comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: Leonard Neville Thornton, b. 25 Dec 1895, was the son of the late H. Thornton, C.E., and of Dorothy K. Thornton, of 11, Lansdown Crescent, Cheltenham.  He was educated at Cheltenham College and afterwards attended Birmingham University.  He was commissioned in January 1915 and was killed leading his platoon in an attack on German trenches near Martinpuich, on the Somme.//
